main.name: I'm George Silva
main.description: A software developer specialized in creating web applications using Python (Backend), React (Frontend) and AWS
main.bio: I'm a Software Developer with 6+ years of experience. Good knowledge of Python, Django, Flask, Javascript, React, PHP, SQL, AWS, Docker, ShellScript and Linux. I have been working using agile methodologies such as SCRUM. In the last 3 years I have been working as Python Developer with experience in big national companies as Coco Bambu Restaurant, HAPVIDA Health, yzzer.com and international companies like Owlish Technology/Petco, Integritas Solutions(USA) and JalaSoft(Bolivia)/ScienceLogic(USA)
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Analysis and Systems Development - Associate's degree

work.title: Python Developer
work.description: Working as an outsource developer to the customer SienceLogic, developing and creating fixes on their product SL1 using python, JavaScript, and PHP. I do work using SNMP protocol, Linux command, AWS services, and MySQL databases. We do work using Scrum, daily meetings, and sprints. Communication just in English.

project.name: SL1

activities.description: Development of Python code to collect various data types: Network Interface, SNMP Devices, Network availability, etc…
Development and management of Thread, Multiprocess, routines, coroutines and stand alone modules to collect data from devices
Strong routine working using Linux server to handle, create the environments, deploy, etc..
Development of Database SQL using Mysql and MariaDB
Development of unit, integrations, and acceptance tests.
Daily communication with American team
Use of the JIRA Software as management tool

project.Technologies: Python; Virtual Machine; MySQL; Linux; Pytest, SNMP Protocol, SNMP Walk, CI/CD; Jenkins

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: An American company that provides outsourcing services and I've worked inside the customer called Q2 e-banking, one of the biggest digital e-banking around the USA. They have a digital platform built using asynchronous application, and my responsibility was creating new functionalities for new customers inside the platform, in the frontend using React, TypeScript, Jest (Unit Tests), and in the backend using Python, Tornado Framework, PostgreSQL, Pytests and Linux Server. Following the best practices in the workflow, using scrum, JIRA, and CI/CD processes using gitlab-CI.

project.name: Q2 e-banking

activities.description: Development of Python/Tornado (asynchronous application)
Development of frontend features using ReactJS
Development of unit, integrations, and acceptance tests.
Daily communication with American team
Use of the JIRA Software as management tool

project.Technologies: Python; Tornado; JavaScript; ReactJS, PostgreSQL; Linux; Pytest, CI/CD; Gitlab-ci

work.title: Python Developer
work.description: Oowlish technology is a company located in Brazil but has customers from abroad, and I've worked for an American customer called Petco as an employee. The project I've worked on is called Insurance and Wellness. It's a web platform initially B2B and after adapted to D2C that provides Insurance plan (Insurance) and veterinary services (Wellness). I've worked in 2 strands. The first one was creating backend serverless applications using Python, Django, GraphQL (Graphene), MySQL, Docker, and AWS Services such as Lambda, API Gateway, RDS, Route53, CloudWatch. The second one was creating end-to-end automation tests. Using Robot Framework, Selenium, TestRail, SauceLabs, and Docker with CI/CD process using gitlab-ci and ATDD Methodology

project.name: Wellness/Insurance

activities.description: Development of Python/Django Applications
Development of GraphQL APIs using Python and Graphene
Development of Automated Testing using Robot Framework and Selenium
Development of scalable structure using Docker and Docker-compose
Development of serverless application using Lambda Functions, API Gateway and S3
Deploy of project using CI/CD with Gitlab-c
Development project using TDD and ATDD
Daily communication with American team

project.Technologies: Python; Django, GraphQL, Graphene, Zappa, MySQL, Docker, Sumo Logic, Sentry, EC2, Lambda Functions, Gitlab Runners, RDS, Selenium, Robot Framework, Makefile, Docker, Docker-compose, Pytest, UnitTest, JIRA.

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: I've worked on creating a project for a customer called Hapvida, the biggest health network private in Brazil finding solutions for their issues. Standardization of Medical Report is a project created from problems that the doctors were facing creating reports manually and making human mistakes. I've worked with one more backend developer to create a solution in 2 strands. One area to create the model of reports and another to fill out the model with the real values. We've worked using Python, Django, Django rest Framework, Docker, Pytest, JavaScript, Angular, AWS Services, JIRA, and Scrum.

project.name: Standardization of Medical Report

activities.description: Development of Python/Django API
Development of front-end (Javascript/Angular) application
Development of scalable structure using Docker/Kubernates
Development of cloud application using Amazon Web Service
Development project using Jira/Scrum
Development project using Test Driven Development.

project.Technologies: Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Swagger Documentation, DRF-yasg, Docker, Docker-compose, Ubuntu Server, Oracle, Bitbucket, Jira, TDD, Insomnia, PyCharm

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: I worked in one of the biggest restaurant chains in Brazil. I've worked on a project called Discount Coupon. This project was created to reach Coco Bambu's clients giving them a discount coupon. Basically, the client downloads the app from Play Store/App Store, chooses the coupons, presents to the waiter, and receives the discount in the establishment. I've worked creating the API Rest and cloud using Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Swagger, PostgreSQL, Docker, ElasticSearch, Sentry, and AWS Services such as EC2, RDS, LoadBalancer, AWS Cloud Formation.

project.name: Coco Bambu API / Dashboard

activities.description: Development of Python/Django/Django Rest API
Development using Docker
Development of distributed applications using AWS
Development of project using SCRUM
Development project using Test Driven Development.

project.Technologies: Python, Django, Django Rest, Swagger Documentation, Docker, Ubuntu Server, GitLab, TDD, AWS Services
